sn46.16:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
sn46.16:4.2: Tena kho pana samayena bhagavā ābādhiko hoti dukkhito bāḷhagilāno.
sn46.16:4.3: Atha kho āyasmā mahācundo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn46.16:4.5: Ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho āyasmantaṃ mahācundaṃ bhagavā etadavoca:
sn46.16:5.1: “Sattime, bhante, bojjhaṅgā bhagavatā sammadakkhātā bhāvitā bahulīkatā abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattanti.
sn46.16:5.3: Satisambojjhaṅgo kho, bhante, bhagavatā sammadakkhāto bhāvito bahulīkato abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati … pe …
sn46.16:5.4: upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo kho, bhante, bhagavatā sammadakkhāto bhāvito bahulīkato abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati.
sn46.16:5.5: Ime kho, bhante, satta bojjhaṅgā bhagavatā sammadakkhātā bhāvitā bahulīkatā abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattantī”ti.
sn46.16:6.4: Tathāpahīno ca bhagavato so ābādho ahosīti.
